title: Ejecting the Cleaning Pad for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
description: This is an instructional video for ejecting the cleaning pad for your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. To eject the Braava jet™ Cleaning Pad without touching the dirt, lift the handle and pull back on the pad eject button. Disposable cleaning pads can be dropped directly into the trash and Washable Cleaning Pads (sold separately) can be dropped into the laundry bin.

asset.title: Ejecting the Cleaning Pad for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
asset.description:
This is an instructional video for ejecting the cleaning pad for your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. To eject the Braava jet™ Cleaning Pad without touching the dirt, lift the handle and pull back on the pad eject button. Disposable cleaning pads can be dropped directly into the trash and Washable Cleaning Pads (sold separately) can be dropped into the laundry bin.

For more information, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
asset.author: iRobot

transcripts: You don't have to get your hands dirty to eject the Braava jet cleaning pad. Simply lift the handle and pull the back on the pad eject button. The dirty disposable cleaning pad can be dropped directly into the trash. Washable cleaning pads can be dropped directly into the laundry bin.
